sentences: Two years later, a record label manager encouraged Wise to move to Nashville, Tennessee once Wise had turned eighteen.
Wise signed to Equity Music Group in 2008 at age nineteen.
The label closed soon afterward, and he signed to Broken Bow Records in September 2009.
Broken Bow released his single "Cornfields" in mid-2010, followed by "I've Got This Feeling" later in the year.
